typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Sno as string,
		Region as string,
		Country as string,
		{Item Type} as string,
		{Sales Channel} as string,
		{Order Priority} as string,
		{Order Date} as string,
		{Order ID} as string,
		{Ship Date} as string,
		{Units Sold} as string,
		{Unit Price} as string,
		{Unit Cost} as string,
		{Total Revenue} as string,
		{Total Cost} as string,
		{Total Profit} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> csvsrc
source(output(
		sno as integer,
		Region as string,
		Country as string,
		{Item Type} as string,
		{Sales Channel} as string,
		{Order Priority} as string,
		{Order Date} as timestamp,
		{Order ID} as string,
		{Ship Date} as timestamp,
		{Units Sold} as double,
		{Unit Price} as double,
		{Unit Cost} as double,
		{Total Revenue} as double,
		{Total Cost} as double,
		{Total Profit} as double,
		iscurrent as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sqlsrc
csvsrc derive(Sno = toInteger(Sno),
		each(match(startsWith(name,'Total')), $$ = toDouble($$)),
		each(match(startsWith(name,'Unit')), $$ = toDouble($$)),
		each(match(endsWith(name,'Date')), $$ = toDate($$))) ~> TypeCast
TypeCast, sqlsrc lookup(TypeCast@Sno == sqlsrc@sno,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSno
LookupSno select(mapColumn(
		Sno,
		Region,
		Country,
		{Item Type},
		{Sales Channel},
		{Order Priority},
		{Order Date},
		{Order ID},
		{Ship Date},
		{Units Sold},
		{Unit Price},
		{Unit Cost},
		{Total Revenue},
		{Total Cost},
		{Total Profit},
		iscurrent
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> csvsource
csvsource sink(input(
		sno as integer,
		Region as string,
		Country as string,
		{Item Type} as string,
		{Sales Channel} as string,
		{Order Priority} as string,
		{Order Date} as timestamp,
		{Order ID} as string,
		{Ship Date} as timestamp,
		{Units Sold} as double,
		{Unit Price} as double,
		{Unit Cost} as double,
		{Total Revenue} as double,
		{Total Cost} as double,
		{Total Profit} as double,
		iscurrent as integer,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		sno = Sno,
		Region,
		Country,
		{Item Type},
		{Sales Channel},
		{Order Priority},
		{Order Date},
		{Order ID},
		{Ship Date},
		{Units Sold},
		{Unit Price},
		{Unit Cost},
		{Total Revenue},
		{Total Cost},
		{Total Profit},
		iscurrent
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
